question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the entrance of the community and see a parking space on your right. Given the next steps for the planned milestone, what are your next steps?  
choose:  
A. I rise.  
B. I rotate the camera downward.  
C. I fly forward.  
D. I turn left.  
E. I turn right.  
F. I rotate the camera upward.  
G. I descend.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: To navigate to the entrance of the community and see a parking space on your right, turning right is the logical next step based on the current orientation and layout of the environment. This direction aligns with the goal of approaching the community entrance while keeping an eye out for the parking space on the right side.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 10)]
Option: [E]
Reason: From the initial position (0-10s), to navigate to the entrance of the community and see a parking space on the right, turning right is the logical next step based on the current orientation and layout of the environment. This direction aligns with the goal of approaching the community entrance while keeping an eye out for the parking space on the right side.
